Name: Find inactive styles
Description: Can I find inactive styles applied to an element?
Author: @pankajparashar

Chrome.Notes:
> Enable authoring hints, by opening **Settings** (`F1`) > **Experiments** > Filter on "authoring hints" > Check "Enable CSS Authoring hints..."
1. In **Elements** > Locate the authored styles in the **Styles** pane > Inactive declarations have an "i" icon, which on hover reveals a tooltip displaying more information.
Chrome.Name: Find inactive styles

Firefox.Notes: 1. In **Inspector** > Locate the styles in the **Rules** pane. Inactive styles will have an "i" icon next to it, which on hover will reveal more information about it.
Firefox.Name: Find inactive styles

Edge.Notes:
> Enable authoring hints, by opening **Settings** (`F1`) > **Experiments** > Filter on "authoring hints" > Check "Enable CSS Authoring hints..."
1. In **Elements** > Locate the authored styles in the **Styles** pane > Inactive declarations have an "i" icon, which on hover reveals a tooltip displaying more information.
Edge.Name: Find inactive styles
